net.consensys.cava.rlpx

Class RLPxConnectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.consensys.cava.rlpx.RLPxConnectionFactory

  • public final class RLPxConnectionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory creating RLPxConnection, either from initiating a handshake or responding to a handshake request.

    • Method Detail

      • createHandshake

        public static AsyncResult<RLPxConnection> createHandshake(SECP256K1.KeyPair keyPair,
                                                          SECP256K1.PublicKey remotePublicKey,
                                                          java.util.function.Function<Bytes,AsyncResult<Bytes>> initAndResponse)
        Creates a complete interaction to run a handshake with a remote peer.
        Parameters:
        keyPair - our key pair
        remotePublicKey - the peer public key
        initAndResponse - a function giving us the peer response, and allowing us to respond to them to finalize the handshake
        Returns:
        a future RLPxConnection created as the result of the handshake

      • respondToHandshake

        public static RLPxConnection respondToHandshake(Bytes initiatorMessageBytes,
                                                SECP256K1.KeyPair keyPair,
                                                java.util.function.Consumer<Bytes> responseHandler)
        Creates a RLPxConnection in response to a handshake initiation message.
        Parameters:
        initiatorMessageBytes - the initiation message raw bytes
        keyPair - our key pair
        responseHandler - a function to respond back to the peer that we acknowledged the connection
        Returns:
        a valid RLPxConnection

      • init

        public static Bytes init(SECP256K1.KeyPair keyPair,
                         SECP256K1.PublicKey remotePublicKey,
                         SECP256K1.KeyPair ephemeralKeyPair,
                         Bytes32 initiatorNonce)
        Creates a handshake initiation message using ephemeral keys and a random nonce.
        Parameters:
        keyPair - our key pair
        remotePublicKey - the peer public key
        ephemeralKeyPair - our ephemeral key pair for this connection
        initiatorNonce - our random nonce
        Returns:
        the bytes of a handshake initiation message for a given peer

      • readResponse

        public static HandshakeMessage readResponse(Bytes response,
                                            SECP256K1.SecretKey privateKey)
        Decrypts the handshake response using our private key.
        Parameters:
        response - the raw response bytes
        privateKey - our private key
        Returns:
        a decrypted handshake response message

      • generateRandomBytes32

        public static Bytes32 generateRandomBytes32()
        Generates a new random 32 byte array.
        Returns:
        a new Bytes32 object filled with random bytes

      • createConnection

        public static RLPxConnection createConnection(boolean initiator,
                                              Bytes initiatorMessage,
                                              Bytes responderMessage,
                                              SECP256K1.SecretKey ourEphemeralPrivateKey,
                                              SECP256K1.PublicKey peerEphemeralPublicKey,
                                              Bytes32 initiatorNonce,
                                              Bytes32 responderNonce,
                                              SECP256K1.PublicKey ourPublicKey,
                                              SECP256K1.PublicKey peerPublicKey)
        Creates a RLPxConnection based off the complete handshake exchange.
        Parameters:
        initiator - whether we initiated the handshake
        initiatorMessage - the bytes of the initiation message
        responderMessage - the bytes of the response message
        ourEphemeralPrivateKey - our ephemeral private key
        peerEphemeralPublicKey - the peer ephemeral public key
        initiatorNonce - the initiation random nonce
        responderNonce - the responder random nonce
        ourPublicKey - our public key
        peerPublicKey - the public key of the peer
        Returns:
        a valid RPLx connection to communicate between peers

      • messageSize

        public static int messageSize(Bytes msgBytes)
        Identify the size of a handshake message based on elements of the common MAC.
        Parameters:
        msgBytes - the bytes of the message
        Returns:
        the size of the message, including MAC, key and IV
